titleStmt.title: Rare verities. The cabinet of Venus unlocked, and her secrets laid open. : Being a translation of part of Sinibaldus, his Geneanthropeia, and a collection of some things out of other Latin authors, never before in English.
Geneanthropeiae. Selections. English
titleStmt.author: Sinibaldi, Giovanni Benedetto, 1594-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Briggs, at the Dolphin in St Pauls Church-yard,
